markdownRemark.excerpt: so my bluetooth was acting all wonky - and I really, really did not want to do a factory reset of my phone. My android was not pairing, or pairing and not…
markdownRemark.html:
so my bluetooth was acting all wonky - and I really, really did not want to do a factory reset of my phone. My android was not pairing, or pairing and not connecting, etc. etc.

So what do I do ?

I fire up my good ole terminal on my android handset and do

“rm -rf /data/misc/bluetoothd/*”

Reboot and all bluetooth settings are reset.

Awesome!

frontmatter.title: How to reset your Android bluetooth settings without factory reset
